comment.author: 18753752@N00
comment._content: Also called the Richardson Trophy. It was crafted by Tiffany and it still being awarded today: www.lmsrf.org/yrugl/R_trophy.htm Here's a copy of it that was awarded to Harry Nye in 1967. www.lmsrf.org/yrugl/History.htm Much cruder than the real one show above.
